meanings.sent1: A microwatt is a very tiny amount of power.
meanings.sent2: The device consumes only a microwatt of electricity.
meanings.sent3: I tried to power my entire house with just a microwatt, but it didn't work out.
meanings.sent4: In the world of energy, a microwatt is like a whisper in a hurricane.
meanings.sent5: The glow of the nightlight was as dim as a microwatt.

meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one millionth of a watt.
meanings.sent1: The sensor detected a microwatt of energy coming from the source.
meanings.sent2: The solar panel produced only a microwatt of electricity under the cloudy sky.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a superhero holding a microwatt of power in my hand.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was so soft, it felt like she was speaking in microwatts.
meanings.sent5: The tiny LED emitted a faint glow powered by a single microwatt.
